headline: Comstock Welcomes Perspire Sauna Studio to The Hartford
summary: RESTON, Va., August 12, 2025--Comstock Holding Companies, Inc. (Nasdaq: CHCI) ("Comstock"), a leading asset manager, developer, and operator of mixed-use and transit-oriented properties in the Washington, D.C. region, announced today that Perspire Sauna Studio has signed a lease to occupy 1,700 square feet of street-level retail space at The Hartford, located at 3101 Wilson Boulevard in Arlington, Virginia.
